p: One microliter of each sample was centrifuged at 13000× g for 10 min. The supernatant was discarded, and the pellet solubilized in 1 mL of DMSO. The final solution was vortexed for 30 s to homogenize the violacein and centrifuged at 13000× g for 10 min to remove cell debris. The violacein was quantified spectrophotometrically at OD 595 (UV-1800 Shimadzu, Japan) [ 50]. Percent inhibition of violacein production in the presence of carvacrol-chemotype oil from Lippia was measured as follows, [(OD control−OD treated)/OD control] × 100%. Simultaneously, cell viability of CV026 strain was determined by bacteria viable count. All experiments were carried out with three biological replicates.
